va-burial-in-national-cemetery.title: Burial in VA National Cemetery
va-burial-in-national-cemetery.headline: Burial in VA National Cemetery
va-burial-in-national-cemetery.summary: Veterans, service members, and some family members may be eligible for burial in a VA national cemetery.
va-burial-in-national-cemetery.eligibili: The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service.
discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
a member of the National Guard/Reserve
died as a result of a service-connected disability/illness
died while receiving/traveling to VA care
died while receiving/eligible for VA compensation
